item.description:
Machiavelli: Discourses on Livy 2

At our next (and last) meeting about Machiavelli's Discourses on Livy we will focus on the 2nd and the 3rd (the last two) chapters of this book.

We plan again to highlight some particularly important sections if someone has no time to read the complete chapters.
Besides the Sanford ecyclopedia's article about Machiavelli:
http://plato.stanford...
I also would like to suggest a nice website about Roman history:
http://www.roman-empi...
item.name: Machiavelli: Discourses on Livy 2
